context_of_use: This use case allows users to download reports for offline review and analysis.
stakeholders_and_interests: customer: ability to analyze data offline
description: Enable users to download reports for offline review and analysis.
triggering_event: User requests to download a report.
postconditions: User can access the report offline.
assumptions: Users have the necessary permissions to download reports.
requirements_met: The system shall allow users to download reports.
The system shall ensure that only authenticated users can download reports.
outstanding_issues: Clarification on the types of reports available for download.
main_flow: 1. user → System requests authentication → System responds with authentication prompt.
2. user → System provides credentials → System verifies credentials.
3. user → System requests to download a report → System processes the request.
4. System → user confirms download → System initiates download.
5. System → user report is downloaded successfully.
alternative_flows: AF-1 (from Step 3): If the user chooses to view reports instead, the system displays the available reports.
exception_flows: EF-1 (from Step 2): If authentication fails, the system displays an error message and prompts the user to re-enter credentials.
